message.entry: Data must be a two-dimensional matrix.
Data must be a numeric, logical, string, cell, or table array
Values within a cell array must be numeric, logical, or char
Data within a cell array must have size [1 1]
ColumnWidth must be a row vector

''ColumnWidth'' must be an array containing ''fit'', ''auto'', positive numbers, or positive integers paired with ''x''. You can specify ''ColumnWidth'' as a cell array containing any combination of values, or as a string array when all elements are of the same type.
ColumnFormat popupmenu definitions must be row vectors
ColumnFormat popupmenu definitions cannot contain empty matrices
ColumnFormat popupmenu definitions must contain only char values

ColumnFormat definitions must be either ''numeric'', ''logical'', ''char'', ''short'', ''long'', ''short e'', ''long e'', ''short g'', ''long g'', ''short eng'', ''long eng'', ''bank'', ''+'', ''rat'' or be a popupmenu definition
ColumnFormat definitions must be either ''numeric'', ''logical'', ''char'', or be a popupmenu definition
ColumnFormat must be a cell array
ColumnFormat must be a row vector
ColumnEditable must be a row vector
ColumnEditable must be a logical or logical array
Cannot convert char edit to logical matrix.
Cannot convert logical edit to char matrix.
Cannot convert logical edit to numeric matrix.
Cannot convert numeric edit to logical matrix.
Data must be a two-dimensional matrix.
Values within a cell array must be numeric, logical, or char
Data within a cell array must have size [1 1]
BackgroundColors must contain at least one color of the form [r g b]

entry.note: translate=false set due no translatable content

message.entry: Option for ''{0}'' must be a positive integer within the range of data, or a character vector matching a variable name.
Option for ''{0}'' must be a positive integer within the range of data.
Option for ''{0}'' must be an 1-by-2 vector of positive integers within the range of data.
